headline.main: For Incoming International Students, a College Checklist for June

headline.main: New Poll: The Supreme Court and the Health Care Law

byline.original: By ADAM LIPTAK and ALLISON KOPICKI

docs.lead_paragraph: A proposal to bring together NYU Langone Medical Center and the Continuum Health Partners network would change how medical care is delivered in the city.

headline.seo: NYU Langone and Continuum Agree to Pursue Merger
headline.main: New York Hospitals Look to Combine, Forming a Giant
headline.print_headline: Hospital Blocs Look to Merge, Forming Giant

docs.abstract: NYU Langone Medical Center and Continuum Health Partners agree to pursue a merger that would shake up the way medical care is delivered, especially in Manhattan, where hospitals compete to serve some of the wealthiest neighborhoods in the world; merger would create one of the largest health care systems in the city, with immense market power.
docs.snippet: A proposal to bring together NYU Langone Medical Center and the Continuum Health Partners network would change how medical care is delivered in the city.

keywords.value: New York University Langone Medical Center
keywords.name: organizations

docs.lead_paragraph: As a general practitioner with a practice in Nassau County, Dr. Fredric Cogan was familiar with the usual flus, fevers and fractures his patients dealt with. But after taking over as the official doctor for backstretch workers at Belmont racetrack two years ago, he now specializes in a new list of ailments, like horse bites, rat bites and bedbug bites, not to mention the damage that can result from being hit by a thoroughbred swinging its head.

headline.main: Treating Workplace Injuries, When the Office Is Belmont Racetrack

docs.abstract: City Room blog; Dr Fredric Cogan works as the official doctor for backstretch workers at the Belmont Park racetrack, specializing in a set of ailments unique to those who work around horses. Photos (M).

headline.main: At Belmont Park, a Clinic's Doctor Gets Track Workers Back on Their Feet
headline.print_headline: Treating Workplace Injuries, When the Office Is Belmont Racetrack

docs.abstract: Dr. Fredric Cogan tends to many complaints peculiar to a horse-racing track, like horse bites, rat bites and broken jaws from being hit by a thoroughbred's swinging head.
docs.snippet: Dr. Fredric Cogan tends to many complaints peculiar to a horse-racing track, like horse bites, rat bites and broken jaws from being hit by a thoroughbred's swinging head.

headline.main: Because of Katie, Children With Severe Disabilities Can Live at Home

docs.abstract: Most Americans have never heard of Katie Beckett. But because her mother persuaded Ronald Reagan to waive Medicaid rules on her behalf, my severely disabled son can be raised at home.
docs.snippet: Most Americans have never heard of Katie Beckett. But because her mother persuaded Ronald Reagan to waive Medicaid rules on her behalf, my severely disabled son can be raised at home.
